definition: indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: I think you are too busy to take an afternoon off.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们真是忙得连个下午都抽不出来了。

sentences.english: Look at this cornicing. This is good work.
sentences.chinese: 瞧瞧这檐口，真是好手艺。

sentences.english: " You this bag is very special, fell into the water and no water wet".
sentences.chinese: “你这个包还真是很特别，掉进水里也没进水湿掉”。

sentences.english: I wondered if this was really what post-collegiate life was supposed to be like.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否大学毕业后的生活就真是这个样子。

sentences.english: Moving while naked is a pain in the ass.
sentences.chinese: 光着身子的同时动来动去真是烦死我了。

sentences.english: It's a pity that you should have to leave.
sentences.chinese: 你非走不可真是很遗憾。

sentences.english: They were so glad to be together.
sentences.chinese: 又能在一起，他们真是太高兴了。

sentences.english: She is really an aggressive lady.
sentences.chinese: 她真是个天不怕地不怕的女人。

sentences.english: The Gibeonites were very good actors!
sentences.chinese: 这些基遍人真是很好的演员。

sentences.english: I think Chinese food is perfect in color, aroma and taste.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得中餐菜真是色香味俱佳。

sentences.english: Lily:I went to the Flora Expo last weekend. It was so crowded.
sentences.chinese: 我上个周末去花博，真是人挤人啊。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, it was a sampler. She says the stripling's fun.
sentences.chinese: 一个星期三场音乐会真是有点拼命干，对不对？

sentences.english: The interior decoration of this house is really good.
sentences.chinese: 这户人家的室内装修真是没说的。

sentences.english: I mean , he is the king of idiots.
sentences.chinese: 我的老板真是愚蠢，我的意思是他是个大白痴。
“那真是个慈善家，”艾伦猛然说道。

definition: interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
